Reference

Explainers

Functions that generate model adapters

explain.default() explain()

Create Model Explainer

print(<explainer>)

Print Explainer Summary

Instance Level Explanations

Functions that generate and plot instance/local level explanations from model explainers

model_prediction() predict(<explainer>)

Calculate Predictions for Explainer

variable_attribution() variable_attribution_oscillations() variable_attribution_break_down() variable_attribution_break_down_interactions() variable_attribution_shap()

Instance Level Variable Attribution as Break Down or SHAP Explanations

individual_profile()

Instance Level Variable Effect as Ceteris Paribus Profile

individual_diagnostics()

Instance Level Residual Diagnostics

plot(<individual_diagnostics_explainer>)

Plot Instance Level Residual Diagnostics

Dataset Level Explanations

Functions that generate and plot dataset/global level explanations from model explainers

model_performance()

Model Performance Measures

variable_importance()

Dataset Level Variable Importance as Change in Loss Function after Variable Permutations

plot(<model_performance_explainer>)

Plot Model Performance Explanations

print(<model_performance_explainer>)

Print Model Performance Summary

Model performance measures

Model performance measures for packages from the DrWhy.AI universe

loss_cross_entropy() loss_sum_of_squares() loss_root_mean_square() loss_accuracy() loss_one_minus_auc()

Calculate Loss Functions

Supplementary functions

Shared functions for packages from the DrWhy.AI universe

update_label()

Update label of explainer object

update_data()

Update data of an explainer object

print(<description>)

Print Natural Language Descriptions

yhat()

Wrap Various Predict Functions

model_info()

Exract info from model

print(<model_info>)

Print model_info

install_dependencies()

Install all dependencies for the DALEX package

colors_discrete_drwhy() colors_diverging_drwhy() colors_breakdown_drwhy()

DrWhy color palettes for ggplot objects

theme_drwhy() theme_drwhy_vertical()

DrWhy Theme for ggplot objects

Datasets

Datasets used in Examples and Vignettes

apartments

Apartments Data

titanic titanic_imputed

Passengers and Crew on the RMS Titanic Data

dragons

Dragon Data

HR

Human Resources Data
